SBEs_domain_example
===================

.. py:module:: SBEs_domain_example

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   SBE Domain Example - Physics simulation with GaAs quantum wire parameters

   This example demonstrates semiconductor Bloch equation simulations for a
   GaAs quantum wire with realistic material parameters and physical scenarios.



Functions
---------

.. autoapisummary::

   SBEs_domain_example.create_gaas_parameters
   SBEs_domain_example.cleanup_environment
   SBEs_domain_example.simulate_optical_response
   SBEs_domain_example.analyze_optical_properties
   SBEs_domain_example.analyze_band_structure
   SBEs_domain_example.plot_optical_response
   SBEs_domain_example.main


Module Contents
---------------

.. py:function:: create_gaas_parameters()

   Create parameter files for GaAs quantum wire.


.. py:function:: cleanup_environment(temp_dir, original_dir)

   Clean up temporary environment.


.. py:function:: simulate_optical_response()

   Simulate optical response of GaAs quantum wire.


.. py:function:: analyze_optical_properties()

   Analyze optical properties of the quantum wire.


.. py:function:: analyze_band_structure()

   Analyze band structure and material properties.


.. py:function:: plot_optical_response(times, field_data, polarization_data, charge_data, energy_data)

   Plot optical response results.


.. py:function:: main()

   Run GaAs quantum wire domain example.
